metadata.title: CVE-2021-26934 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel 4.18 through 5.10.16, as usedby Xen. The backend allocation (aka be-alloc) mode of the drm_xen_frontdrivers was not meant to be a supported configuration, but this wasn'tstated accordingly in its support status entry.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
